title: Perform Final Assembly Quality Check
description: Before an aircraft rolls out of the factory, a quality inspector must perform a final walk-around inspection to check for any defects.

tasks.description: Follow a detailed checklist to inspect the aircraft's exterior for any cosmetic defects, such as scratches or dents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the exterior inspection checklist.

tasks.description: Verify that all required placards and markings are correctly installed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all placards are present and legible.

tasks.description: Document any findings and create a snag list of items to be rectified before the official rollout.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a minor paint defect and adds it to the snag list.
